resources.string: \"Hello there! If you enjoy the content I create or find my assistance helpful, please consider buying me a coffee. Your support will not only help me stay fueled and motivated but also enables me to continue producing valuable and insightful information. Every cup of coffee contributes to my ongoing efforts to share knowledge and make a positive impact. Your generosity is greatly appreciated, and together, we can make a difference. \nThank you for being a part of this journey!\"
